title: Nosferatu Vlad REALLY needs a new voice and model update.
body:
Skin is great but Vlad's super American voice just kinda ruins the feel of the skin. Just saying.

As for the model, he seems super unproportional. On par with Katarina before they fixed her. He may be the TINIEST champion in game outside of yordles and annie with this skin.

**Size comparison to Jinx:**
http://i.imgur.com/oiXCEdL.jpg?1
(face is up to Jinx's chest, who isn't even standing up straight. Borderline midget.)

replies.body:
I think Vladimir will be looked at soon. I do honestly believe story and lore could be updated, too. The Runeterra worlds and characters must be developed from a consistent foundation, an idea of that world. I've propose lore (not story) for Vladimir doing just that, more or less.

#_Thread: [[Vlad VU](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/pgAIiXAc-vlad-vu?comment=0000)]_
He and others like him become unliving. A volatile variation of undead.
He is not plagued with the Shadow Isle's curse.

Noxus becomes known for Hemomancy practices (not just Necromancy). 
When you think of Hemomancy you'd automatically think of Noxus.
When you think of Necromancy you'd automatically think of Shadow Isle.
